genresAdvancedInfo.name: botswana pop
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Botswana pop is a genre of music that emerged in Botswana in the 1980s and gained popularity in the 1990s. It is characterized by its fusion of traditional Botswanan rhythms and modern pop music elements, such as electronic beats and synthesizers. Artists such as Vee Mampeezy and ATI are popular in this genre, and their music often reflects the country's social and political issues.
